title: U.S. attorney resigns under pressure from Trump to charge N.Y. AG Letitia James
summary: Erik Siebert resigned after President Trump said he wanted him "out" after a monthslong mortgage fraud investigation into New York Attorney General Letitia James failed to result in criminal charges.

title: Opinion: Robert Redford will always light up our screens
summary: The late Robert Redford will be remembered for his many movie roles. But he also leaves the artistic legacy of the Sundance Film Festival, which nurtured generations of independent filmmakers.

title: Lawyers vs. engineers: Dan Wang sees U.S.-China dynamics in a new paradigm
summary: In a new book, analyst Dan Wang uses "engineering state" vs. "lawyerly society" to explain how China got ahead and America stagnated.

title: 5 lessons from a house that generates more energy than it uses
summary: With higher utility bills, a house that produces more energy than it uses may be appealing. In southern California, one such house has existed for more than a decade.

title: Cyberattack disrupts check-in systems at major European airports
summary: A cyberattack targeting check-in and boarding systems has disrupted air traffic and caused delays at several of Europe's major airports, officials said Saturday.
